title: 06/15/2021 - The Herd Best Of
itunes:title: 06/15/2021 - The Herd Best Of
description:
Colin compares Kawhi Leonard to some of the other all time great players and what makes Leonard different from the rest. He dissects the 76ers and their star players and why it's officially time to break up their 2 star players now that it's clear they cannot win together. He also explains why Aaron Rodgers is creating a difficult situation for the Packers front office. Plus, long time NBA veteran Udonis Haslem joins the show to talk about his experience with LeBron James on the Heat and what it's like winning a championship on a super team.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
